channel.title: Abortion
channel.description:
Personally, I think it is completely wrong to have an abortion on an unborn child. Think about this carefully. You are taking away a life when you do it.
You are removing any chances that person had to be great. They might grow up and help the world one day. Be a doctor, a firefighters, save lives.
If a woman aborts her child, she is killing it. She chooses to take away someone's life. No one has that right. The child is not "hers." You can't own a life.
Post your thoughts.

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Alex Owns:

No one deserves the right to take away someone else’s life. It might be inside that damn woman, but she can’t own a life. NO ONE owns a life.

Have you ever aten a shrimp? Shrimp is one of my favorite foods.

Anyways, if taken during the first trimester, the fetus is probably no more developed then a shrimp.

Read full topic

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:28, topic:33846”]its my belief that abortion is a right

if a girl, 16, gets pregrant, it is probably the worst thing for her to have that baby
give up school, working at McDonals, single parantage, wrecking her whole life
and when the baby comes, the mother will probably feel hate towards it for ruining its life

if the governtment take away peoples right, women will not care, it will only force them to go to ‘BackStreet Abortion Clinics’, which is basicly an old lady who …emm… knows what to do,
imagine having your uterus scrapped out and thrown unceremonially into a bucket
infertillity, every if the woman wants to have children later in life, she cannot
also some people just abandon their babys in a cardboard box outside a charity shop

iv heard of very young people getting pregnant, there was one a 12 year old who kept her baby because she saw the ultrasound scan, i knew this girl around the corner from me, 14 years old and pregnant, thankfully shes aborting

i dont want to make any snap judgements but your veiws are very idilalistic, they cannot work in practice

the only issue i have with abortion is when people us it for contraception, “forget the johnny, we can just abort”, this is really wrong because it costs the hospitals and goverment more than a simple 20 pence condom

you say the woman does not own the baby, this can work both ways, the baby also owns the woman, when he one-night stander leaves her and she is forced by the baby to work in crap jobs at minimum wage instead of going to school and getting an education[/quote]

Yeah, there are a million different reasons that Abortion should be a right and should not be decided by the gov’t if you can abort the baby or not. Put yourselves in another person’s shoes. If any of you people who don’t believe in abortion, say if you were a woman, and you got raped or even had sex consensually, and became pregnant. What would you do?

Say your parents were busy and you didn’t want to put them into a foster home, and you didn’t want to lose a year of school because of being pregnant. If you were a teenager too, what would you do? Would you keep the baby and not have a future and probably have the kid live on the streets? or Would you do yourself and the baby a favor and just abort it?

Read full topic

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I don’t see a problem with it. I can understand points of view that you are ‘killing’ your child, but I there are many scenarios where, I think, abortions are right:

Rape
Condom Split
Un-planned Pregnancies
Teenage Pregnancies

I have no problem with abortion, but then again, I live in the UK, where abortion is almost a right to all women.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

It’s fine. The being only counts as “alive” after the first 14 months of birth. Anything that you do before those 14 months is from a biological standpoint “OK”. Your moral standpoint may differ; but science has never lost a round yet.

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

This issue mainly exists in the US. Not so much of a problem in canada, or europe, same with most other non-puritanical countries. So here is my take on it.

Woman gets raped by … a rapist. Gets pregnant. Should she be able to abort it? Yes.

Father has sex with daughter, dauter is pregnant. Should she be able to abort it? Yes.

Those 2 arguments against abortion are deciding the laws. Whether or not you agree with abortion, the right to chose should ALWAYS go to the person who is pregnant. No matter what. You know why? Cause we’re Americans, and we’re supposed to be free and we’re supposed to be able to choose what happens to us. If someone goes against that, they are unpatriotic.

Read full topic
